question: 喜寿
sourceMnemonic: You can <kanji>rejoice</kanji> because your <kanji>lifespan</kanji> has reached this special point. That special point is your <vocabulary>seventy seventh birthday</vocabulary>. So many sevens, lucky!
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are the on'yomi reading. You've seen the on'yomi reading of <ja>喜</ja> before, though it may be hard to remember at this point. Maybe you can think about how when you reach this <vocabulary>seventy seventh birthday</vocabulary>, all you want is a <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>) to the city so you can do whatever you want.
